quote.title: Get a Quote
quote.subtitle: Fiat-to-fiat at blockchain speed. Multi-rail smart routing. Minimum amount 5,000.
quote.valid_diff: Source and target currencies must differ.
quote.disclaimer: iPAYX charges 0.7% on top of the best partner rate found. Total shown includes both fees. Savings calculated vs industry-average legacy wire (2.8%).
quote.error_generic: Could not fetch quote. Please retry.
quote.savingsCompare: All savings calculations compare iPAYX Protocol fees against industry-average traditional wire transfer fees (approximately 2.5%). These are estimates only and not guarantees.
quote.costFactors: Your final costs depend on factors outside iPAYX Protocol's control, including but not limited to:
quote.bankFees: Your bank's specific fee structure and pricing agreements
quote.thirdParty: Third-party service agreements you may have with financial institutions
quote.regulatoryFees: Regulatory fees, correspondent banking charges, and other intermediary costs
quote.networkCongestion: Network congestion and blockchain gas fees (for crypto segments)
quote.liabilityText: iPAYX Protocol is not responsible for cost differences arising from external agreements, market conditions, or third-party fee changes. If you have negotiated rates with your bank below industry averages, your savings may differ.
quote.acknowledgment: By using this quote tool, you acknowledge that all figures are estimates for planning purposes only. Always verify final costs with your financial institution before proceeding.
savingsWidget.ipayxRow: iPayX fee (0.7% flat on executed volume)
savingsWidget.tt_legacy: The 2‚Äì3% band reflects typical bank/PSP all-in costs (incl. FX) observed in B2B volumes.
savingsWidget.tt_ipayx: The 0.7% covers multi-rail smart-routing, supervision and webhooks.
savingsWidget.tt_variables: Network fees and external FX spreads may apply per corridor.
roiCalculator.title: ROI Calculator
roiCalculator.creditRateDescription: Enter your actual line of credit interest rate (e.g., 8.5%, 12%, 15%)
roiCalculator.opportunityRateDescription: Even without credit, your capital frozen for 4 days could generate returns elsewhere (investments, expansion, etc.). Enter your expected return rate.
roiCalculator.ipayxMessage: ‚ö° 8 seconds settlement + 0.7% flat fee = predictable costs
payment.disclaimer: iPAYX does not hold funds. We route payments through regulated partners.
